refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This manual page documents briefly the &dhpackage; package.
The &dhpackage; package is a collection of configuration files and scripts to enable a user specific apache2 configuration.

It provides the optional inclusion of apache configurations and virtual host definitions from directories in $HOME/apache2. Furthermore it provides scripts to manage these configuration files in a similar way like the standard tools provided by the apache2 package.

refsect1.title: COMMANDS
refsect1.para: The package consists of the following scripts which are documented in their own man page:

listitem.para: Script to enable a user-specific apache2 configuration file. See vhostenconf1 for further details.
Script to disable a user-specific apache2 configuration file. See vhostdisconf1 for further details.
Script to enable a user-specific apache2 virtual host configuration file. See vhostensite1 for further details.
Script to disable a user-specific apache2 virtual host configuration file. See kirbyinstall1 for further details.
Script to show enabled configurations or sites for the user and the main configuration. See vhostquery1 for further details.
The system-wide apache2 configuration file which enables user-specific configuration files.
The system-wide apache2 configuration file which enables user-specific virtual host configuration files.
An example configuration file to define some useful apache2 environment variables and to open a user specific virtual host root folder for apache2.
